item.text: The Lord spoke to Jeremiah after Nebuzaradan the captain of the royal guard had set him free at Ramah. He had taken him there in chains along with all the people from Jerusalem and Judah who were being carried off to exile to Babylon.
The captain of the royal guard took Jeremiah aside and said to him, “The Lord your God threatened this place with this disaster.
Now he has brought it about. The Lord has done just as he threatened to do. This disaster has happened because you people sinned against the Lord and did not obey him.

But <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st>, Jeremiah, <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st> I <st data-num="02009" class="">will</st> <st data-num="06605" class="">set</st> you <st data-num="06605" class="">free</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0246 0834">chains</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> your <st data-num="03027" class="">wrists</st>. <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">you</st> would <st data-num="02896" class="">like</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me, <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> along and I will <st data-num="07760 05869">take care</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">of</st> you.<n id="2" /> But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">you</st> <st data-num="07489" class="">prefer not</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me, you <st data-num="02308" class="">are not required to do so</st>.<n id="3" /> You <st data-num="07200" class="">are</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">free</st> to go <st data-num="03605" class="">anywhere</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> you <st data-num="0413 02896 0413 03477 05869">want</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">to go</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">wherever</st> you choose.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="05750 03808">Before</st> Jeremiah could <st data-num="07725" class="">turn to leave</st>, the captain of the guard added, “<st data-num="07725" class="">Go back</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st> and <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st> of <st data-num="08227" class="">Shaphan</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="06485" class="">appointed</st> to govern<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>. Go back and <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>. <st data-num="0176" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413 03605">wherever</st> <st data-num="03477 05869 01980">else you choose</st>.” Then the <st data-num="07227" class="">captain</st> of the <st data-num="02876" class="">guard</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> Jeremiah some <st data-num="0737" class="">food</st> and a <st data-num="04864" class="">present</st> and <st data-num="07971" class="">let</st> him <st data-num="07971" class="">go</st>.
So Jeremiah went to Gedaliah son of Ahikam at Mizpah and lived there with him. He stayed there to live among the people who had been left in the land of Judah.

Now some of the officers of the Judean army and their troops had been hiding in the countryside. They heard that the king of Babylon had appointed Gedaliah son of Ahikam to govern the country. They also heard that he had been put in charge over the men, women, and children from the poorer classes of the land who had not been carried off into exile in Babylon.

So<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01992" class="">all these officers</st> and their <st data-num="0582" class="">troops</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st> at <st data-num="04708" class="">Mizpah</st>. The officers who came were <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st>, <st data-num="03110" class="">Johanan</st> and <st data-num="03129" class="">Jonathan</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="07143" class="">Kareah</st>, <st data-num="08304" class="">Seraiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="08576" class="">Tanhumeth</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="05778" class="">Ephai</st> the <st data-num="05200" class="">Netophathite</st>, and <st data-num="03153" class="">Jezaniah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of the <st data-num="04602" class="">Maacathite</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st> and <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st> of <st data-num="08227" class="">Shaphan</st>, <st data-num="07650 0559">took an oath</st> so as to give them and their <st data-num="0376" class="">troops</st> some assurance of safety.<n id="1" /> “Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">be afraid</st> to <st data-num="05647" class="">submit to</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03427" class="">Settle down</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="05647" class="">submit to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>. Then things will <st data-num="03190" class="">go well</st> for you.

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="02005" class="">for</st> my <st data-num="02005">part will</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st> at <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st> to <st data-num="05975" class="">represent</st> you <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">whenever</st> they <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> us. <st data-num="0859">You for your part</st> go ahead and <st data-num="0622" class="">harvest</st> the <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st>, the <st data-num="07019" class="">dates</st>, the <st data-num="07019" class="">figs</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st>, and <st data-num="07760" class="">store</st> them in <st data-num="03627" class="">jars</st>. Go ahead and <st data-num="03427" class="">settle down</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="08610" class="">taken over</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01571" class="">Moreover</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03064" class="">Judeans</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were in <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>, <st data-num="01121 05983">Ammon</st>, <st data-num="0123" class="">Edom</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the other <st data-num="0776" class="">countries</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> what had happened. They heard <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> had <st data-num="05414" class="">allowed</st> <st data-num="07611" class="">some people</st> to stay in <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="06485" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st> and <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st> of <st data-num="08227" class="">Shaphan</st>, to <st data-num="05921" class="">govern</st> them.
So all these Judeans returned to the land of Judah from the places where they had been scattered. They came to Gedaliah at Mizpah. Thus they harvested a large amount of wine and dates and figs.
Johanan, son of Kareah, and all the officers of the troops that had been hiding in the open country came to Gedaliah at Mizpah.

They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “Are you <st data-num="03045" class="">at all</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">aware</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01185" class="">Baalis</st> of <st data-num="01121 05983">Ammon</st> has <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st> to <st data-num="05221 05315">kill</st> you?” But <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st> would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0539" class="">believe</st> them.

Then <st data-num="03110" class="">Johanan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07143" class="">Kareah</st> <st data-num="0559 0559">spoke</st> <st data-num="05643" class="">privately</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st> there at <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st>, “<st data-num="01980 04994">Let</st> me <st data-num="01980 04994">go</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05418" class="">Nethaniah</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">before</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">knows</st> about it. <st data-num="04100" class="">Otherwise</st> he will <st data-num="05221 05315">kill</st> you<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03064" class="">Judeans</st> who have <st data-num="06908 0413">rallied around</st> you will be <st data-num="06327" class="">scattered</st>. Then <st data-num="07611" class="">what remains</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> will <st data-num="06" class="">disappear</st>.”
But Gedaliah son of Ahikam said to Johanan son of Kareah, “Do not do that because what you are saying about Ishmael is not true.”
